description:
AJMJ-25 EMBROIDERED NET 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Net Trouser: Lawn Silk Dupatta: Net Color: Pink

Experience the joy of celebration with Asim Jofa’s “Jag Mag Collection” featuring this outfit which is designed to make you shine like never before with its intricate embroidery and luxe designs that exude glamour and jovial vibes. The copper base of the outfit is complemented by a peach dupatta creating a vibrant contrast that is perfect for any festive occasion. The neckline and grand borders are adorned with antique gold zariwork and 5mm gold sequins adding an extra layer of elegance to the ensemble. The dupatta is also embroidered completing the look with a touch of sophistication.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front neckline on net

30'' embroidered front with border on net

30'' embroidered back with border on net

Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on net

Pair of embroidered bunches for sleeves on net

1.25 meters embroidered border for front chaak on net

2.5 meters embroidered dupatta on net

1.5 meters dyed wide-width lawn silk for trouser
